page.title: 07ELM FARM
page.content: The owner starts work at 6.00am.His first job is to milk the cows which usually takes an hour.The farmer has 61 Friesain cows.He also mixes diffrent sorts of cows to produce better sorts of cows.The cows eat 200 tonnes of food and produce 1400 litres of milk a day.At least one cow is carved every year.The owner has been a farmer for 15 years and has owned Elm farm for 5 years.The farmer has one person working for him 30 hours a week .He owns 1 tractor 4 trailers which need repairs too often,and the vet is needed once every fortnight.He became a farmer too produce food and enjoyes working outdoors.The farmer has to make his spare time,and enjoys watching television.
